doc.field: Record Group 12. History of the Ethical Culture Schools (1902-2015; 4 linear feet)
Record Group 12. History of the Ethical Culture Schools (1902-2015; 4 linear feet)

This record group contains materials related to the Ethical Culture Fieldston School's efforts to record and preserve their institutional history. This includes the collection of historical materials and the creation of written narratives and oral histories, as well as the management of the school's institutional archives.
